entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS Why no mention of hydroxychloroquine? Is it because of the Veterans Affairs study showing it's ineffective against covid-19 or worse, exacerbates its ill effects?
